uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.model.data.filter

Class SelfReferenceFilter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.model.data.filter.SelfReferenceFilter<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of filter
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    BaseFilter<T>, BaseSQLFilter<T>, PatternFilter<T>, SQLFilter<T>, Targetted<T>

    public class SelfReferenceFilter<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements SQLFilter<T>, PatternFilter<T>
    Filter to select by IndexedReference It selects on the primary key of the provided repository using a reference to the corresponding data object. The type of the filter is specified separately as this might be a composite object made from a join
    Author:
    spb
